_source.contentraw:
New York Democrats are bracing for stunning Election Day losses, and they already have a fall guy

Democratic officials and strategists in New York tell CNN they are bracing for what could be stunning losses in the governorâs race and in contests for as many as four US House seats largely in the suburbs.

With crime dominating the headlines and the airwaves, multiple Democrats watching these races closely are pointing to New York City Mayor Eric Adams, accusing him of overhyping the issue and playing into right-wing narratives in ways that may have helped set the party up for disaster on Tuesday.

âHe was an essential validator in the city to make their attacks seem more legit and less partisan,â said one Democratic operative working on campaigns in New York, who asked not to be named so as not to compromise current clients.

_source.content: WHICH IS TO BE MASTER?"When I use a word,â Humpty Dumpty said in rather a scornful tone, âit means just what I choose it to mean â neither more nor less.ââThe question is,â said Alice, âwhether you can make words mean so many different things.ââThe question is,â said Humpty Dumpty, âwhich is to be master â â thatâs all.â - Excerpt from Alice in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll, the pen name of Charles Lutwidge Dodgson.Words aren't immutable objects. They can change over time and frequently do so. However, when a group of elites sets out to specifically change language for the purpose of control, well, then one has Alice in Wonderland 1984-style.Words are the key to complex thoughts and, especially, the transmission of thoughts. Without personal mastery of words, freedom to spread ideas is hijacked and the controller of words becomes master.George Orwell, or Eric Arthur Blair as he really was, put it thus, "There is no swifter route to the corruption of thought than through the corruption of language."Virtually nobody has heard of Eric Arthur Blair or Charles Lutwidge Dodgson. We know what we know, whether or not we know it at all. When others control words for us we end up knowing only what they want us to know, which will never be much worth knowing.
_source.contentraw:
WHICH IS TO BE MASTER?

"When I use a word,â Humpty Dumpty said in rather a scornful tone, âit means just what I choose it to mean â neither more nor less.â

âThe question is,â said Alice, âwhether you can make words mean so many different things.â
âThe question is,â said Humpty Dumpty, âwhich is to be master â â thatâs all.â - Excerpt from Alice in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll, the pen name of Charles Lutwidge Dodgson.

Words aren't immutable objects. They can change over time and frequently do so. However, when a group of elites sets out to specifically change language for the purpose of control, well, then one has Alice in Wonderland 1984-style.

Words are the key to complex thoughts and, especially, the transmission of thoughts. Without personal mastery of words, freedom to spread ideas is hijacked and the controller of words becomes master.

George Orwell, or Eric Arthur Blair as he really was, put it thus, "There is no swifter route to the corruption of thought than through the corruption of language."

Virtually nobody has heard of Eric Arthur Blair or Charles Lutwidge Dodgson. We know what we know, whether or not we know it at all. When others control words for us we end up knowing only what they want us to know, which will never be much worth knowing.

_source.content: Pillow salesman and Trump ally Mike Lindell loses court bid to reclaim phone seized by FBI, access warrant detailsCNN ^ | 11/4/2022 | Katelyn Polantzhttps://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/pillow-salesman-and-trump-ally-mike-lindell-loses-court-bid-to-reclaim-phone-seized-by-fbi-access-warrant-details/ar-AA13IEmaA federal judge in Minnesota has rejected Mike Lindellâs challenge to the FBI search and seizure of his phone in a 2020 election-related criminal probe.Judge Eric Tostrud said Lindell, CEO of My Pillow and a prominent backer of former President Donald Trumpâs false voter fraud claims, had not shown that the search was unconstitutional, and said he could not have his phone returned or get more access to details from the search.âThe Government has demonstrated a compelling interest in preventing the premature disclosure of search-warrant materials during its ongoing federal criminal investigation. Multiple factors here justify keeping the search warrant materials under seal,â the judge wrote.
_source.contentraw:
Pillow salesman and Trump ally Mike Lindell loses court bid to reclaim phone seized by FBI, access warrant details
CNN ^ | 11/4/2022 | Katelyn Polantz
https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/pillow-salesman-and-trump-ally-mike-lindell-loses-court-bid-to-reclaim-phone-seized-by-fbi-access-warrant-details/ar-AA13IEma

A federal judge in Minnesota has rejected Mike Lindellâs challenge to the FBI search and seizure of his phone in a 2020 election-related criminal probe.

Judge Eric Tostrud said Lindell, CEO of My Pillow and a prominent backer of former President Donald Trumpâs false voter fraud claims, had not shown that the search was unconstitutional, and said he could not have his phone returned or get more access to details from the search.

âThe Government has demonstrated a compelling interest in preventing the premature disclosure of search-warrant materials during its ongoing federal criminal investigation. Multiple factors here justify keeping the search warrant materials under seal,â the judge wrote.

Prager University is the world's leading conservative nonprofit that is focused on changing minds through the creative use of digital media. Taking full advantage of today's technology and social media, we educate millions of Americans and young people about the values that make America great. Donations to PragerU are tax-deductible.***Turning Point USA - Turning Point USAÂ is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization founded in 2012 byÂ Charlie Kirk. The organizationâs mission is to identify, educate, train, and organize students to promote the principles of freedom, free markets, and limited government. Turning Point USA believes that every young person can be enlightened to true free market values.***Young Americaâs Foundation is committed to ensuring that increasing numbers of young Americans understand and are inspired by the ideas of individual freedom, a strong national defense, free enterprise, and traditional values.As the principal outreach organization of the Conservative Movement, the Foundation introduces thousands of American youth to these principles.Â We accomplish our mission by providing essential conferences, seminars, educational materials, internships, and speakers to young people across the country.***Camus Reform - As a conservative watchdog to the nationâs higher education system, Campus Reform exposes liberal bias and abuse on the nationâs college campuses. Our team of professional journalists works alongside student activists and student journalists to report on the conduct and misconduct of campus administrators, faculty, and students. Campus Reform holds itself to rigorous journalism standards and strives to present each story with accuracy, objectivity, and public accountability.

Prager University is the world's leading conservative nonprofit that is focused on changing minds through the creative use of digital media. Taking full advantage of today's technology and social media, we educate millions of Americans and young people about the values that make America great. Donations to PragerU are tax-deductible.***Turning Point USA - Turning Point USAÂ is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization founded in 2012 byÂ Charlie Kirk. The organizationâs mission is to identify, educate, train, and organize students to promote the principles of freedom, free markets, and limited government. Turning Point USA believes that every young person can be enlightened to true free market values.***Young Americaâs Foundation is committed to ensuring that increasing numbers of young Americans understand and are inspired by the ideas of individual freedom, a strong national defense, free enterprise, and traditional values.As the principal outreach organization of the Conservative Movement, the Foundation introduces thousands of American youth to these principles.Â We accomplish our mission by providing essential conferences, seminars, educational materials, internships, and speakers to young people across the country.***Camus Reform - As a conservative watchdog to the nationâs higher education system, Campus Reform exposes liberal bias and abuse on the nationâs college campuses. Our team of professional journalists works alongside student activists and student journalists to report on the conduct and misconduct of campus administrators, faculty, and students. Campus Reform holds itself to rigorous journalism standards and strives to present each story with accuracy, objectivity, and public accountability.


We could use a few extra moderators for this group. If you're interested in being a moderator for the group please contact: @help or support@gab.com

According to the new unabridged Bible, God Created Generalissimo DeSantis on the 8th day. Praise the Lord! Pass the meth. Want a date with a 14 year old girl? Move to Florida. Want to be a White Christian White Supremacist? Move to Florida.
I still have that image of Ron DeSantis wearing his Dallas Cowboy Cheerleader boots when he was touring the damage Hurricane Ian did. Fashion statement.
When a guy says to you; "I am not wearing a tin foil hat", whose last name is Trump,
after he gives a speech usually means he just left it in his car. According to Eric Bat Shit Crazy Trump, who has been making the rounds at every QAnon meeting he can get to, did it again, and boy this time he told a Whopper!
Did you know those evil Democrats want to destroy Christianity? And families? Our children? And history?
Gee, we did not know that. Last Thanksgiving there were more than 300 QAnon idiots camping out on Dealey Plaza in Dallas, TX because they said without a doubt, 100%, for certain, that JFK and JFK Jr. would be appearing there and lead Donald Trump back into the white house! And then, they did not show up. Because they both have a chronic case of being dead. And there was Eric Dumb Ass Trump again making a complete fool out of himself.
Wonder what his kids think of him? Does his family keep the 300 foot roll of aluminum foil in their house? Dems don't want to kill all children, just enough to make Andrenalchrome so they can live forever!! Whatever.
In the Phoenix, AZ newspaper, which is quite conservative, even they are saying people who live there are nuts. Between a bunch of militia wanna-bees running around, hanging out at polling boxes, looking like silly little Halloween boys, to Kari Lake telling her fans; "so what if I have no experience in politics, I want to rule the world!".
Arizona has always struck me as being a creepy place. I had to stop in Gila Bend, AZ one time while traveling from LA to El Paso, and in the gas station was a sign that read; our gas prices are cheaper because we will never give the feds one dime in tax money, and we do not accept credit cards! The 4 guys at the counter looked like the hillbillies from the movie Delivance. Creep show. Hey! Where do you want to live? In the frigging desert where it gets to 130 degrees on a regular basis. Cooks their brains.
Speaking of Arizona; A few years ago the Saudi's came to Arizona and bought up 3,000,000 acres of farm and ranch land to grow alfalfa and cattle. Nobody said a word about it back in 2010 because it was right after the housing bubble burst in 2009, and those land owners thought they made a killing by selling their land for 5 times more than it was really worth. But now? In La Paz county, AZ about 100 miles West of Phoenix where most of that Saudi owned land is, all the wells are running dry. And those very same Saudi land owners are taking water out of the Colorado River at alarming levels now.
While the local politicians there in La Paz County count the money the Arabs give them every month so they don't bitch. And to add insult to injury, all that beef and alfalfa they grow? Goes straight back to Saudi Arabia via ships leaving out of Long Beach, CA. None of it stays in the US. First the Saudis had their guys fly planes into the twin towers in 2001, then they rolled into Arizona and screwed everyone there. When will we learn?
Oprah Winfrey has officially endorsed John Fetterman in PA for US Senate. Against the wishes of Dr. "Facelift" Oz's campaign. The bizarro thing about this is Oprah invented Dr. Oz. If it wasn't for her, none of us would of ever heard his name, unless you were stupid enough to purchase some of his vitamin supplements.
CNN is becoming hysterical now. Chris Cizzilla and some others there claim the race for governor of New York might be going to the GOP!!! Help Help! Then we read the latest polling data from companies like 538 Polls which shows Hochul with the same 9 pt lead she has had for over 2 months! Hysteria silliness. Even after John Fetterman gave a very bad debate performance, voters in PA still love him anyway. Dr. Oz according to only one Republican poll is ahead in PA. Marist College polling companynm(rated A+ for accuracy), who polls registered voters only, just released their last polls before Tuesday, and they have Fetterman up by 6 pts. 3 other polling companies with only a 67% reliabilty rating say Dr. Oz is ahead by 2 pts. And Chris Cizilla is hysterical now.
Wow!
